definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: Jefferson wrote, was the declaration of independence was "the referee" alliance.
sentences.chinese: 杰斐逊曾写道，《独立宣言》是“吁请世界的裁判”。

sentences.english: Where the Declaration of Independence was signed?
The most perplexing word in the declaration is equality.
sentences.chinese: “平等”是独立宣言中最为棘手的字眼。

sentences.english: But Jefferson, the chief architect of the Declaration of Independence, believed otherwise.
sentences.chinese: 但《独立宣言》的设计师杰斐逊不以为然。

sentences.english: We see it in the American Declaration of Independence.
sentences.chinese: 在美国《独立宣言》中可以看到。

sentences.english: When was the Declaration of Independence?
sentences.chinese: 《独立宣言》是什么时候宣布的？

sentences.english: Stockton was one of the signers of the Declaration of Independence.
sentences.chinese: 史达肯是独立宣言的签署者之一。

sentences.english: The US Declaration of Independence was written on hemp paper.
sentences.chinese: 美国独立宣言就是写在麻纸上。

sentences.english: The Declaration of Independence was made in America in 1776.
Well, my long hair is indeed a declaration of independence.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我的长头发极其需要一份独立宣言。

sentences.english: They are, in order, the Great Seal of the United States, the signing of the Declaration of IndependenceHall and the Lincoln Memorial.
sentences.chinese: 他们是，美国国玺，独立宣言的标记和林肯博物馆。

sentences.english: Frederic Bastiat could have easily been a fellow traveler of the signers of our Declaration of Independence.
sentences.chinese: 巴斯夏容易与《独立宣言》的缔约者是同一路人。

sentences.english: Why Chose Madeira Wine to Celebrate the Declaration of Independence?
sentences.chinese: 签署《独立宣言》为啥喝马德拉酒？

Mei3 li4 jian1 He2 zhong4 guo2

definition: Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), American writer, scientist, inventor, politician and diplomat
pinyin: Ben3 jie2 ming2 · Fu4 lan2 ke4 lin2

definition: Manifesto of the Communist Party/"Manifest der Kommunistischen Partei" by Marx and Engels (1848)
